title: Do i get demoted if i don't play ranked until the season is over
body: Hi I am in Diamond V in ranked flex and I want to know if I will get demote to Plat I. Do I stay in Diamond V without playing any games until the season is over? Also when does the season end?

replies.body: Certain queues are subject to what we call 'decay'. If you don't play in the ranked queue for a certain amount of time you can drop a rank depending on what you are currently. [**Read up on all the details on how decay works over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q1) to make sure you don't miss anything.
So I need to play at least one game before the season is over?

Yes. 
You should also play a second game just to be safe since its going to be more than 28 days until the end of the season. 


Note: You don't have to win them. Just play to show your active.
